com.db4o.io
Class IoAdapter

java.lang.Object
  com.db4o.io.IoAdapter
Direct Known Subclasses:
CachedIoAdapter, RandomAccessFileAdapter, VanillaIoAdapter
Deprecated. Use classes that implement Storage instead. The new functionality has been split: Storage is the factory class to open Bin adapters. Bin is the actual implementation of IO access. 

public abstract class IoAdapter
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for database file adapters, both for file and memory databases.
